TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ExtensibleClassFactory extends System.Object

summary.span: 在创建过程中启用从非托管对象扩展的托管对象的自定义。

span.span: Enables customization of managed objects that extend from unmanaged objects during creation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ExtensibleClassFactory`允许用户指定`delegate`，在提供基础的 COM 对象的实例的运行时可调用包装 (RCW) 的构造过程中调用。The `ExtensibleClassFactory` allows users to specify a `delegate` that is called during construction of a runtime callable wrapper (RCW) that provides an instance of the underlying COM object. 实际上，回调充当包装 RCW 的 COM 对象的类工厂。In effect, the callback acts as the class factory for the COM object wrapped by the RCW. 不执行回调，公共语言运行时创建基础的 COM 对象通过调用`CoCreateInstance`。Without the callback, the common language runtime creates the underlying COM object by calling `CoCreateInstance`. 此回调提供的替代方式的激活基础对象，例如，通过 COM 标记，或通过提供单一实例对象。This callback provides an alternative way of activating the underlying object, such as with a COM moniker or by providing a singleton object. 必须调用方法`static`扩展 RCW 的类初始值设定项。The method must be called in the `static` initializer of the class that is extending the RCW. 只有一个对象创建回调允许每个对象类型。Only one object creation callback is permitted per object type. 当激活可扩展 RCW 时，注册回调。When the extensible RCW is activated, the callback is registered. 需要创建基本的 COM 对象，将调用回调，以提供对对象的引用。When the underlying COM object needs to be created, the callback is called to provide a reference to the object. 回调必须返回`IUnknown`基对象的接口指针。The callback must return an `IUnknown` interface pointer for the base object. ## Examples 注册`delegate`需要分配聚合的非托管的对象的托管类型的扩展从非托管类型的实例时，将调用的。Registers a `delegate` that will be called whenever an instance of a managed type that extends from an unmanaged type needs to allocate the aggregated unmanaged object. 这`delegate`应分配，并聚合的非托管的对象和称为代替了`CoCreateInstance`。This `delegate` is expected to allocate and aggregate the unmanaged object and is called in place of a `CoCreateInstance`. 此例程必须调用的上下文中`static`初始值设定项将为其进行回调类。This routine must be called in the context of the `static` initializer for the class for which the callbacks will be made. [!code-cpp[Classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic ExtensibleClassFactory Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterObjectCreationCallback(class System.Runtime.InteropServices.ObjectCreationDelegate callback) cil managed
Public Shared Sub RegisterObjectCreationCallback (callback As ObjectCreationDelegate)

span.span: A that is called in place of .

summary.span: 注册一个 ，每次从非托管类型扩展的托管类型的实例需要分配聚合的非托管对象时，都要调用该委托。

span.span: Registers a that is called when an instance of a managed type, that extends from an unmanaged type, needs to allocate the aggregated unmanaged object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这`delegate`分配并聚合了非托管的对象会调用代替了`CoCreateInstance`。This `delegate` allocates and aggregates the unmanaged object and is called in place of `CoCreateInstance`. 这`delegate`必须注册的上下文中`static`类初始值设定项将为其进行回调。This `delegate` must be registered in the context of the `static` class initializer for which the callbacks will be made. 层次结构中的只有一个类应注册`delegate`回调。Only one class in an hierarchy should register a `delegate` callback.
